name: Stranger Things
description: A group of young friends witness supernatural forces and secret government exploits.

name: Money Heist
description: A group of skilled robbers plan heists led by a mastermind known as The Professor.

name: Breaking Bad
description: A chemistry teacher turned meth kingpin partners with a former student to secure his family's future.

name: The Witcher
description: A monster hunter struggles to find his place in a world where people can be worse than beasts.

name: Dark
description: A small town unravels a mystery involving time travel and interconnected families.

name: Peaky Blinders
description: A gangster family rises to power in Birmingham after World War I.

name: The Boys
description: A group of vigilantes fight corrupt superheroes backed by a powerful corporation.

name: Wednesday
description: Wednesday Addams investigates mysteries at Nevermore Academy while discovering her powers.

name: Squid Game
description: Hundreds of people risk their lives in deadly games for a chance at a massive cash prize.

name: Loki
description: The God of Mischief navigates the Time Variance Authority and multiple timelines.

name: Game of Thrones
description: Noble families fight for control of the Iron Throne in the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros.
